oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-08-16 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 16, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performer Jean Shepard, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, June Carter, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 984th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Jean Shepard; Stringbean; Ernest Tubb
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ernest Tubb introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ernest Tubb introduces Jean Shepard -- Sweet Temptation (Jean Shepard) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Stringbean -- John Henry (Stringbean) -- Grant Turner and Ernest Tubb announce his tour schedule -- Half A Mind (Ernest Tubb) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ernest Tubb) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Emmons, Buddy; Byrd, Billy; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Shepard, Jean, 1933-
